resources.string:
1. Start by searching for city on Ticket Screen by entering your search text.
2. Once you click on the search button, a list of items matching your search will be displayed.
3. Click on any item in the list to view its details.
4. Click on save button in the list to save your particular event.
5. Saved event ticket can be accessed by clicking on the 'Saved Events' button on the search screen, where you can also delete saved items.

1.Click on a match list item to view its details.
On the match details screen, there are options:
2.Click on Highlights to redirect to the match's webpage.
3.Click on Video Link to redirect to the match's video.
4.To save the match, click on Save Match.
5.On the match list screen, you can view your saved matches.

1. Start by searching for movie on Film Screen by entering your search text.
2. Once you click on the search button, a list of items matching your search will be displayed.
3. Click on any item in the list to view its details.
4. From the details page, you have the option to save the image.
5. Saved images can be accessed by clicking on the 'Saved Images' button on the search screen, where you can also delete saved items.
